channel.title: [pi] chaning home
channel.description:
ok i followed these steps that were on a guide and i couldnt even find the home cords in the places it said dose any1 know where to search on a pi to change home?
First, teleport to your current home, type ::mypos to find the coordinates of your home.
Go into Player.java, located in src\server\model\players, and search for you current homes x coord.
Replace the teleportToX and teleportToY coords with your new home coords. This changes where new players start.
Now go into ClickingButtons.java, located in src\server\model\players\packets, and search for your current homes x coord and repl
